docs.summary: The authoritative store for a site's business information (e.g. name, address, phone number etc.)

docs.summary: Triggered when site properties are updated

permissions.name: Manage Your App

members.name: primary
members.doc: Primary site category.

members.name: secondary
members.doc: Secondary site category.

members.name: languageCode
members.doc: Language code (ISO 639-1).

members.name: country
members.doc: Country code (ISO 3166-1).

members.name: languageCode
members.doc: Language code (ISO 639-1).

members.name: locale
members.doc: Locale.

members.name: isPrimary
members.doc: Whether the supported language is the primary language for the site.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Language icon.

members.name: resolutionMethod
members.doc: How the language will be resolved. For internal use.

docs.summary: Languages supported on a multilingual site.

members.name: autoRedirect
members.doc: Whether to redirect to user language.

docs.summary: Represents a single street address (which may or may not represent an actual, physical location).

members.name: street
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: city
members.doc: City.

members.name: country
members.doc: Country code (2 alphanumeric characters per ISO 3166-1).

members.name: state
members.doc: State (if applicable).

members.name: zip
members.doc: Zip code.

members.name: hint
members.doc: Extra information to be displayed in the address.

members.name: isPhysical
members.doc: Whether this address represents a physical location.

members.name: googleFormattedAddress
members.doc: Google-formatted version of this address (acceptable to most APIs).

members.name: streetNumber
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: apartmentNumber
members.doc: Apartment number (if applicable).

members.name: coordinates
members.doc: Geocoordinates.

docs.summary:
Extra information on displayed addresses.
This is used for display purposes. Used to add additional data about the address, such as "In the passage".
Free text. In addition the user can state where he wants that additional description - before, after, or instead
the address string.

members.name: text
members.doc: Extra text displayed next to, or instead of, the actual address.

members.name: placement
members.doc: Where the extra text should be displayed.

docs.summary: Geocoordinates for a particular address.

members.name: latitude
members.doc: Latitude.

members.name: longitude
members.doc: Longitude.

docs.summary:
Time periods that this location is open for business. Includes a collection of TimePeriod instances.
Aligned with https://developers.google.com/my-business/reference/rest/v4/accounts.locations#businesshours
With a few minor adjustments

members.name: periods
members.doc:
Times that this location is open. Each period represents a range of hours when the location is
open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: specialHourPeriod
members.doc: Exceptions to the business's regular hours.

docs.summary:
A span of time that the business is open,
starting on the specified open day/time and closing on the specified close day/time.
Closing time must occur after the opening time, for example later in the same day, or on a subsequent day.

members.name: openDay
members.doc: Day of the week this period starts on.

members.name: openTime
members.doc:
Time in 24hr ISO 8601 extended format (hh:mm). Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day field.

members.name: closeDay
members.doc: Day of the week this period ends on.

members.name: closeTime
members.doc:
Time in 24hr ISO 8601 extended format (hh:mm). Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day field.

docs.summary: Set of time periods when a location's operational hours differ from its normal business hours.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Date and Time in 24hr iso-8601 Coordinated universal time (UTC)

members.name: endDate
members.doc: Date and Time in 24hr iso-8601 Coordinated universal time (UTC)

members.name: essential
members.doc: Whether the site uses cookies that are essential to site operation.

members.name: functional
members.doc: Whether the site uses cookies that affect site performance and other functional measurements.

members.name: analytics
members.doc: Whether the site uses cookies that collect analytics about how the site is used (in order to improve it).

members.name: advertising
members.doc: Whether the site uses cookies that collect information allowing better customization of the experience for a current visitor.

members.name: dataToThirdParty
members.doc: CCPA compliance flag.

members.name: categories
members.doc: Site categories.

members.name: locale
members.doc: Selected locale.

members.name: language
members.doc: Selected language code (ISO 639-1).

members.name: paymentCurrency
members.doc: Selected currency code (ISO 4217) to bill customers of this site.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Time zone.

members.name: email
members.doc: Publicly-available business email address.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Publicly-available business phone number.

members.name: fax
members.doc: Publicly-available business fax number.

members.name: address
members.doc: Publicly-available business address.

members.name: siteDisplayName
members.doc: Site display name.

members.name: businessName
members.doc: Business name.

members.name: logo
members.doc: Path to the site's logo in Wix Media (without Wix Media base URL).

members.name: description
members.doc: Site description.

members.name: businessSchedule
members.doc: Represents the time periods that this location is open for business. Holds a collection of TimePeriod instances.

members.name: multilingual
members.doc: Supported languages of a site and the primary language.

members.name: consentPolicy
members.doc: Cookie policy the site owner defined for their site (before the users interacts with/limits it).

members.name: businessConfig
members.doc: Site business type. Supported values: FITNESS SERVICE, RESTAURANT, BLOG, STORE, EVENT, UNKNOWN.

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

docs.summary: A single mapping from the MetaSite ID to a particular service.

members.name: serviceType
members.doc: The service type.

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: The application definition ID; this only applies to services of type ThirdPartyApps.

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: The instance ID of the service.

docs.summary: Encapsulates all changes when site properties are updated

members.name: metasiteId
members.doc: ID of the Wix site that has been updated.

members.name: event
members.doc: Update details.

docs.summary: Encapsulates all details written to the Greyhound topic when a site's properties are updated.

members.name: metasiteId
members.doc: The site ID for which this update notification applies.

members.name: event
members.doc: The actual update event.

members.name: translations
members.doc: A convenience set of mappings from the MetaSite ID to its constituent services.

members.name: changeContext
members.doc: Context of the notification

docs.summary: The actual update event for a particular notification.

members.name: version
members.doc: Version of the site's properties represented by this update.

members.name: fields
members.doc: Set of properties that were updated - corresponds to the fields in "properties".

members.name: properties
members.doc: Updated properties.

docs.summary: The parameters of a site properties read request.

members.name: fields
members.doc: The set of desired fields.

docs.summary: The resulting properties for the requested site.

members.name: version
members.doc: Current version of the stored property site. For internal use.

members.name: properties
members.doc: Properties for the requested site.

docs.summary: The request used to update a site's properties.

members.name: properties
members.doc:
The updated properties and their respective values. The subsequent "fields" property determines
which properties are actually considered for updating; specifying the default value for a masked property
deletes the property from the store.

members.name: fields
members.doc: The set of desired properties for updates. Properties not explicitly specified here are ignored.

docs.summary: The details resulting from an update operation.

members.name: version
members.doc: The new version of the stored properties after the update. For internal use.

docs.summary: The request used to update site consent policy

members.name: consentPolicy
members.doc: Cookie policy the site owner defined for their site (before the users interacts with/limits it).

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. The ID of the resolved MetaSite for the request.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type object

docs.summary: The resulting properties for the requested site.

members.name: sites
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. The ID of the resolved MetaSite for the request.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • QUERY_PARAM
  • SUBDOMAIN
  • SUBDIRECTORY

Where the extra text should be displayed: before, after or instead of the actual address. Possible values are:
  • BEFORE
  • AFTER
  • REPLACE

Enumerates the days of the week. Possible values are:
  • MONDAY
  • TUESDAY
  • WEDNESDAY
  • THURSDAY
  • FRIDAY
  • SATURDAY
  • SUNDAY
